CustomField.description: The user populates this percentage field to indicate the maximum debt-to-income ratio an applicant can have to qualify for an auto-approval decision. This field filters offers presented to the applicant. By default, this field is blank.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the maximum debt-to-income (DTI) ratio an applicant may have to qualify for auto-approval in this field.
CustomField.label: Maximum Debt-to-Income
